name: Wooda House - Gorgeous wooden villa on the sea
about:
The house has a total inside living area of 108 m2, and an outside deck area of 114 m2, spread over 2 floors. It can house up to 6 people, 2 in each of the two bedrooms and 2 in the living room. The house has a number of very unique elements that you might not find elsewhere, like the layered wooden walls, shuttered windows, traditional Thai sliding doors, tree trunks as supporting pillars and branches as design elements of furniture and railings. Our experience is that it takes our guests a few hours before they can feel at home, as they often find themselves initially stunned by the beauty and the atmosphere of the house and the breath-taking view.

In every corner of the house and the outside deck you can enjoy good quality wifi. If you stay with us for more than a week, we provide a once-weekly cleaning service to make your stay pleasant.

The house is NOT SUITABLE for very young children. Both floors boast large decks that are NOT FENCED. Therefore, there is a realistic danger of falling into the sea in high tide, or even worse, onto rocks in low tide. If you choose to book the house with your children, make sure they are mature enough to understand the danger and behave accordingly.

Please also note that there is NO air-conditioning in the house. The open way the house is built, allows for plenty of natural sea breeze and there are many fans to cool you down. But if air conditioning is a must for you, our house is not suitable.

name: Comfortable 1-Bedroom Apartment @Surin, beach-650m
about:
The apartment really suitable for both families with the kids or young couples! Located in tranquil & peaceful environment just 8-10 min walk (650m) from two beautiful beaches - Surin & BangTao, the apartment features two separate rooms, fully equipped kitchen, folding sofa, well designed etc. There are several bars, restaurants and convenience stores walking distance from the complex.

Our apartment is located on the 4th floor and it is well designed to become your holiday home in Phuket. It provides a bed for two & pull-out sofa bed which makes the apartment really suitable for both couples and families! You’ll find all the amenities you may need during your vacation:

- High speed internet free of charge ;
- Fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchenware you may need during your stay;
- High quality electric appliances in great variety: washing machine, vacuum cleaner, safe box, microwave, coffee machine, kettle, toaster, iron, stove, hair dryer etc.
- LED TV-set with cable TV channels and HDMI cable to connect your laptop;
- Pull-out sofa bed, becomes double size bed; additional set of bedding for sofa bed can be provided free of charge if you request at least 2 days before check in (please see House Rules);
- Separate bedroom with special expensive topper on the bed which makes it really comfortable;
- Private balcony with outdoor furniture;
- Set of towels for every guest, containing bath, face, and beach towels.
- Weekly bedding and towels replacement free of charge, please see details in the House Rules.
- Baby cot (0-2 y.o.) and high chair can be provided by request (free of charge if requested at least 2 days before check in);
- We offer cars for rental (minimum - 7 days; please check prices according to the season);
- Airport transfer available and highly recommended (please see the House Rules for details).

name: Modern Loft Living near the Nana Skytrain Station
about: Spread out in this spacious, newly remodeled loft apartment with minimalist design elements. Wooden floors and industrial concrete ceilings give a feeling of hip city living. Open the glass doors between rooms to get a wide open space to relax.

name: GARDEN IN BANGKOK B&B
about: We have a lovely garden looks so cool when you walk inside the house. The house has split level floor designed by professional architect . We have 3. bedrooms ( 7 beds) available . However your booking for each 2 people comes with 1 bedroom ( 2 beds). , 1 bathroom with extra toilet on the ground floor . And you could have sole access for your comfortable living :space : garden, veranda , living room, pantry with microwave, water hot pot , tea & coffee , refrigerator , reading area . If you would like to use all the bedrooms in the house. It will come at on additional charge . Please contact your host upon arrival.

name: Teak Rice Barn - Garden & Pool view with balcony
about:
❀❀GREAT DISCOUNTS ON LONGER STAYS❀❀
Ever wanted to stay in a Teak House? Beautiful converted Rice Barn
✔Air-conditioned
✔WIFI throughout the property and TV with Netflix available on request.
✔Swimming pool, beautiful gardens and seating areas all add to this quiet rural settling.
✔Private Kitchen/Dining area.
✔DIY Breakfast included on 1st morning
✔Coffee shop/bar for drinks and items you may have forgotten

DATES NOT AVAILABLE ? BOOK THE FAMILY SIZE RICEBARN INSTEAD

name: Castaway Beach Bungalows - Right on the Beach!
about: Your very own bamboo hut on the edge of a coconut tree lined beach looking out to the distant Angthong islands. Enjoy spectacular sunsets from your hammock or explore the sand bars at low tide. Perfectly located just a few minutes from the pier and main town of Thong Sala. Our on-site coffee shop provides breakfast whilst for relaxed evenings you'll find a seafood restaurant and the coolest bar right next door.For all our room options don't forget to check all our listings here on Airbnb!

name: Poolside private 1 bedroom condo
about:
Cozy, Comfy 1 bedroom condo by poolside. Large balcony best for sun-tanned. Super privacy and close to nature. splendid view.
The condo is 1 bedroom with 43.05 sq.m located on the first floor which out from the room and jump to the pool.
- Pickadaily Bangkok in front of the condo
- The condo is fully furnished with king size real bed, night light, sofa and dinner table for 2.
- Bathroom with tempered glass shower screen

name: Chiang Mai Lanna Sunrise Farmstay
about: Grass roof wooden house on the pond surrounded by rice fields. Enjoy with us the lifestyle of a rice farm. Be a farmer or just sit back and enjoy! Either way, we'd love you to share a few days with our family in our home and farm.

name: The Mustang Nero/No.7 The Zebra Song
about:
This cozy room,The Zebra, is 35 sq m.

The Mustang nero building was renovated from an old commercial building. We still keep the original structure that simplicity and minimalism blending with the vintage furniture which are created raw aesthetic to the hotel atmosphere.

name: New Cozy Place near Shopping Center
about:
Right at the very heart of Phuket!
3 mins to Central Festival (10 mins walk)
4 mins to Big C (15 mins walk)
10 mins to Phuket Old Town
30 mins to Patong Beach
40 mins from airport

name: Free Airport Pickup, 0.8km to Patong Beach#3169
about:
Free airport pick-up service for 3 or more nights booking!
* Room Size: 45 square meters
* Bed Size: 1.8m*2.3m
* Spacious Private Balcony
* Free Wi-Fi & Cable TV
* Bathtub & Shower
* Fridge & Air-condition
